hiveArticle.body: This time i will give away $5.00 Steem Dollars to 100 people. That's $0.005 for each person who upvotes & resteems this post + when this post reaches 100 upvotes and resteems i will give 5 random people $0.20 Steem Dollars.![DQmQLKzfuPTdVAojSjU2gieHWrSWGnskfXHwt9Xh2L8pRjx_1680x8400.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPxAE9cWwA1pgsqFtApbFFaj1Vext3zQJtrPaGcNAaYKw/DQmQLKzfuPTdVAojSjU2gieHWrSWGnskfXHwt9Xh2L8pRjx_1680x8400.png)
